title: Rilakkuma to Kaoru-san (Rilakkuma and Kaoru)
synopsis: Her life might be a little mundane, but Kaoru gets to go home to Rilakkuma, her endearingly lazy roommate who happens to be a fuzzy toy bear.
staff: [['Kobayashi, Masahito', ['Director']], ['Ogawa, Iku', ['Assistant Director', ' Character Design']], ['Pousséo, Dorothée', ['ADR Director']]]
